newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Elektrowatt plans statement at 1500 GMT.
newsitem.headline: Elektrowatt plans statement at 1500 GMT.

text.p: Swiss industrial group Elektrowatt Holding AG said it would release a statement to news media at 4:00 p.m. (1500 GMT) but to declined to comment on the subject.

An Elektrowatt spokesman, queried by Reuters about market rumours of a news conference, said no news conference was planned. "I can confirm that we will release a media statement at 4:00 p.m.," he said.
He declined to say whether there was any connection with market rumours that CS Holding may carry out long-standing plans to sell its 44.9 percent stake in Elektrowatt.
Elektrowatt said it would make the necessary proposals to shareholders at an annual general meeting on February 19, 1997.

"The energy interest of Elektrowatt will be transferred at book value to wholly-owned subsidiary Watt AG as a subscription in kind with an increase in share capital at that company," the statement said.
"Watt shares will then be distributed to the Elektrowatt shareholders as a dividend in kind and listed on the Swiss Stock Exchange," it added.
It said the allotment of Watt shares to Elektrowatt investors and trading of Watt shares would start on February 28.
